Coding Standards¶

docstrings¶

Each class method should have a docstring. It should follow the numpy formatting standard. See this example

Rst files¶

These documenation files are reStructuredText formatted. They are processed into HTML using Sphinx.

Building the HTML Version¶

From .\doc run the command:

make.bat html

Check and fix the cause of any warnings or errors.

If you remove any .rst files you will need to run a clean build. From .\doc run the commands:

make.bat clean
make.bat html

reStructuredText Header Levels¶

We use the following formats for the different reStructuredText header levels:

#######
Level 1
#######

*******
Level 2
*******

Level 3
~~~~~~~

Level 4
=======

Level 5
-------

Level 6
+++++++
